law.catch_line: Building Department established; Director as head; qualifications.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1321. Building Department established; Director as head; qualifications.
The Building Department is established. The Manager shall appoint a Director who shall head the department and serve at the will of the Manager. At all times, the Director shall be qualified and certified as a building code administrator or building official pursuant to the requirements of State law and applicable County ordinances.
